about_the_game:
In the quaint, happy world of Beeflandia - our hero, Beef Cat, and friends always found ways to celebrate good times. The vibes certainly changed, however, when Some Big Guy showed up and started causing a ruckus.

Auto-Battling Mayhem Demo
  • 2 Very Different Stage Styles
  • Over a Dozen Unique Pickups

    Adaptability is the Name of the Game
    • Different gameplay styles from the several modes force you to interact with your characters and the loot pool in unique ways.
    • Survivors has you scrambling through hand-crafted stages collecting items and beating baddies for a certain time limit. Recognizable and classic Survivors gameplay
    • Gauntlet has you exploring linear stages destroying enemy spawners while you collect keys and unlock gates like the classic Gauntlet series

      Beef Cat Ultra is aiming for a Summer 2024 release date!

name: Beef Cat Ultra Demo
short_description: Gameboy-aesthetic auto-shooter with tough handmade stages across two game styles. Collect over a dozen unique power-ups and rock out to a chiptune-guitar fueled soundtrack.
